configOptions.name: autoCompleteFields
configOptions.description: auto complete fields in patient create page. eg. givenName, familyName, caste, primaryContact, secondaryContact, primaryRelative, secondaryIdentifier

configOptions.name: defaultIdentifierPrefix
configOptions.description: Default identifier prefix used in search, create patient. eg. GAN

configOptions.name: searchByIdForwardUrl
configOptions.description: Url to forward when searched by id
